channel.title: Letters on Abigail Elizabeth
channel.description: Recent content in Letters on Abigail Elizabeth

item.title: Mikhail
item.description: Dear Mikhail, Thank you for everything. Thank you for loving me. Thank you for being the bestest friend in the whole world. Thank you for holding me when I’m sad and for wiping my tears. Thank you for being the reason I smile and laugh. But most of all, thanks for being mine. I love you. Love, Abbie

item.title: To You
item.description: Dear you, Thank you for making my life better. Thank you for always being there. I feel like whenever my world starts to fall apart, I’m honored to have someone like you to help me put the pieces back together. It makes me happy when we stay up late together (mom, if you’re reading this, I have never once stayed up late on the phone! Whaaat??) and when we meet up, even if it’s only for a few minutes.

item.title: Letter to Him
item.description: Dear you, Do you know what you’ve done to me? My favorite lies came from your lips. My favorite distractions from your words. My favorite songs from your silence. I’ve been thinking a lot about silence, actually. You sure have given me a lot of it, haven’t you? Given me things to think about. I used to constantly say “easier said than done” but silence is easier done than said.

item.title: Letter One to Mikhail
item.description: Dear Mikhail, Hi tiger! Thank you so much for helping me! I appreciate it! Abbie Over and Out
